sentences.en: A nurse has to fulfill many duties in caring for the sick.
sentences.cn: 护士在照顾病人时要尽很多责任.

sentences.en: And that is why we can fulfill our destiny.
sentences.cn: 这就是为什么我们能实现我们的命运。

sentences.en: Being deaf hasn’t stopped Karen fulfilling her ambition to be a hairdresser.
sentences.cn: 失聪并没有阻止卡伦实现当美发师的抱负。

sentences.en: He is to fulfill those dreams and wishes of his parents which they never carried out.
sentences.cn: 他要满足自己双亲从未实现的梦想和愿望.

sentences.en: He needs these people to fulfill his ambitions and reciprocates by bringing out the best in each of them.
sentences.cn: 他需要这些人去实现他的雄心壮志，作为回报，他也会让他们充分施展各自的才能。

sentences.en: He was not able to fulfill himself in business, so he became a writer.
sentences.cn: 在商业方面他无法将自己的资质完全发挥出来, 所以他选择了作家之路.

sentences.en: If you make a promise you should fulfill it.
sentences.cn: 如果你许诺了,你就要履行你的诺言.

sentences.en: In an effort to fulfill his duty as son - in - law , Hung - chien paid occasional visits to the Suns.
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 勉尽半子之职, 偶到孙家一去.

sentences.en: It falls to our generation to fulfill the great aspirations cherished by countless martyrs in the past.
sentences.cn: 过去无数先烈的远大抱负,要我们这一代去实现.

sentences.en: John was able to fulfill himself through writing.
sentences.cn: 约翰通过写作充分地发挥了自己的才能.

sentences.en: Now we shall use the rationality condition to fulfill our promise.
sentences.cn: 现在我们将使用有理性条件来履行我们的诺言.

sentences.en: The amateur astronomer will be well able to fulfill these.
sentences.cn: 业余天文学家是可能做到这些的.

sentences.en: The company should be able to fulfill our requirements.
sentences.cn: 公司应该能够满足我们的要求.

sentences.en: The question is how we should fulfill our duties.
sentences.cn: 问题是我们应该怎样履行我们的职责.

sentences.en: This company should be able to fulfill our requirements.
sentences.cn: 这家公司应该能够满足我们的要求.

sentences.en: Visiting Disneyland has fulfilled a boyhood dream.
sentences.cn: 迪士尼乐园之游使童年梦想成真。

sentences.en: We engage to fulfill certain obligations.
sentences.cn: 我们保证履行一定的职责.

sentences.en: What important dream have you yet to realize and fulfill?
sentences.cn: 你有什么重要的梦想还没有实现和完成？

sentences.en: You'll never get anywhere in your job unless you reach up to the highest position in the firm and take steps to fulfill your aim.
sentences.cn: 除非你在公司里有望得到最高的地位并采取步骤来实现你的目标,否则你在工作中永远一事无成.

phrases.tran_cn: v. 完全实现自己的抱负

trans.tran_cn: 履行；实现；满足；使结束（等于fulfil）
trans.tran_en: if you fulfill a hope, wish, or aim, you achieve the thing that you hoped for, wished for etc

trans.tran_cn: 履行（诺言等），执行（命令等），达到（目的），使结束
